<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/2f03e5a0a9cfaabb01c57dd3348a05e86c26623c|patch 8.2.0999: moving to next sentence gets stuck on quote>
patch 8.2.0999: moving to next sentence gets stuck on quote

Problem:    Moving to next sentence gets stuck on quote.
Solution:   When moving to the next sentence doesn't result in moving, advance
            a character and try again. (closes #6291)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0999: moving to next sentence gets stuck on quote · vim/vim@2f03e5a
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0999: moving to next sentence gets stuck on quote · vim/vim@2f03e5a
attachments.text: Problem: Moving to next sentence gets stuck on quote. Solution: When moving to the next sentence doesn't result in moving, advance a character and try again. (closes #6291)

patch 8.2.0996: using "aucmdwin" in win_gettype() is not ideal

Problem:    Using "aucmdwin" in win_gettype() is not ideal.
Solution:   Rename to "autocmd".

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/856c1110c1cf0d6e44e387b70732ca4b4c8ef0f2|patch 8.2.0997: cannot execute a register containing line continuation>
patch 8.2.0997: cannot execute a register containing line continuation

Problem:    Cannot execute a register containing line continuation.
Solution:   Concatenate lines where needed. (Yegappan Lakshmanan,
            closes #6272)
